name: Payback Pack
description:
You have a (back)pack.

Like most packs, it's also a missile launcher.

Frantically shuffle items in your pack to clear room and move ammo into the loading zone.  Be warned, enemies will add indestructible static items to your pack! Death comes when you run out of room.

How many paybacks can you administer?

Made for Quarantine Jam 2020 by:

Nicholas Fuller

Jonathan Bourim
